summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting the final version of the indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell. The email includes an attachment of the indictment document.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the final indictment being transmitted in this email.

events.title: Final Maxwell Indictment Transmitted
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails the final version of the indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The final indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell was completed and transmitted on June 28, 2020.
The indictment was handled by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email serves as a cover note for the attached indictment document (Maxwell Indictment_FINAL.pdf).
